name: The Vista
description: The Vista Legacy Series ADU offers 1521 square feet of versatile living space, featuring two bedrooms, two and a half baths, and an open two-story living area. An optional garage adds flexibility to this functional layout.

name: The Haven
description: The The Haven Legacy Series ADU offers 1056 square feet of versatile living space, featuring two bedrooms, one and a half baths, and an open two-story living area. An optional garage adds flexibility to this functional layout.

name: The Nest
description: Our The Nest model is a streamlined one-bedroom, one-bath design with optional porch and patio. It's everything you need in a space that feels just right.

name: The Grove
description: Explore our The Grove model, a thoughtfully designed home featuring two bedrooms, one bath, and a dedicated office. With an optional covered patio and a smart, efficient layout, The Grove offers the perfect blend of comfort, flexibility, and functional living space

name: The Outlook
description: Discover our Outlook model, a cozy yet functional home featuring one bedroom, one bath, and a dedicated office. With an optional covered patio and a smart, efficient layout, Outlook is designed for comfortable living in a compact and stylish space

name: The Retreat
description: Explore our The Retreat model, a spacious one-bedroom, one-bath home with a dedicated office and optional garage, covered porch, and patio. Designed for versatility and comfort, The Retreat provides plenty of room to live, work, and unwind.

name: The Hideaway
description: Explore our The Hideaway model, a well-balanced mid-size home featuring one bedroom, one bath, and a versatile layout. With an optional covered carport and thoughtful design, The Hideaway offers the perfect blend of comfort, efficiency, and everyday convenience

name: The Oasis
description: Explore our The Oasis model, a spacious one-bedroom, one-bath design with an optional covered porch and patio. With a thoughtful layout and room to breathe, The Oasis offers the perfect blend of comfort, style, and indoor-outdoor living.

name: The Summit
description: Explore our The Summit model, a spacious and versatile home offering up to 1,296 sq. ft. of thoughtfully designed living space. With a dedicated office and an optional garage, The Summit provides the perfect balance of functionality, comfort, and room to grow.

name: The Horizon
description: Explore our one-bedroom, one-bath The Horizon model, with optional covered porch and patio. With The Horizon, youâ€™ve got everything you need right at your fingertips: no more, no less.

name: The Crest
description: Explore our The Crest model, a well-appointed one-bedroom, one-bath home with a dedicated office and optional covered porch. Designed for both relaxation and productivity, The Crest offers a perfect balance of comfort, function, and flexible living space.

name: The Dwell
description: Explore our one-bedroom, one-bath The Dwell model, with an optional covered patio. Designed for effortless living, The Dwell offers a perfect balance of comfort, functionality, and style in a compact footprint

name: The Arbor
description: Explore our one-bedroom, one-bath The Arbor model, a smartly designed space that feels both cozy and open. With an efficient layout and optional covered patio, The Arbor is perfect for those seeking a simple, stylish, and functional retreat.
